channel.title: Stackable Items [PLEASE READ]
channel.description:
I'm having a lot of trouble with stackable items on Runesource, I've tried about every method and it doesn't work, I have methods to identify if items are stackable, and I have inventory items stackable (thanks to blake), but I can't get floor items to be stackable when dropped or merely placed on the floor by a method.
Can someone point me in the right direction or create an outline on the steps do this?

item.title: Stackable Items [PLEASE READ]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

what was the problem, did it have to do with an amount?.. if itemStackable it creates 1 with amount 50, rather than 50 with amount 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Stackable Items [PLEASE READ]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

matzie:

I think theres a method called createGroundItem( or something along those lines. Somewhere there is an amount associated with it, change that to a higher value than 1.

Lol, I know that man, do you think I’m stupid…? If I did that to an item like air runes, it would spawn 1 air rune 50 times instead of spawning 50 air runes 1 time. Get it?

But anyways, forget it I figured it out myself.

Read full topic

like when you drop them on the ground then pick them up they’re not stackable?[/quote]

Clawz fury:

but I can’t get floor items to be stackable when dropped or merely placed on the floor by a method
